title: Swenson soloes to win the Leadville Trail 100 MTB race, smashes course record
content:
The Santa Cruz HTSQD finished in 5:43:31, shaving 15 minutes off the course record that was set in 2015.

Read the full article at Swenson soloes to win the Leadville Trail 100 MTB race, smashes course record on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
